channel.title: Send to bank?
channel.description: Im sure everyone is soo tired of haveing to run to the bank if your inv. is full empty it, then go back to shopping again. So im wondering could anyone create, a addon for the server, or client which ever is easyist and make it so that when you right click it has "buy 1..""buy 5..."buy 10..""buy x..." buy x... & send to bank" (the "..." = random item) i belive it could make buy thing slightly easyer. just wondering if anyone want to make that..

item.title: Send to bank?
item.dc:creator: @korlen korlen
item.description:
@korlen wrote:

Im sure everyone is soo tired of haveing to run to the bank if your inv. is full empty it, then go back to shopping again. So im wondering could anyone create, a addon for the server, or client which ever is easyist and make it so that when you right click it has
“buy 1…”“buy 5…“buy 10…”“buy x…” buy x… & send to bank” (the “…” = random item) i belive it could make buy thing slightly easyer. just wondering if anyone want to make that…
